name: Hodge, Appellant, v. Jamie Record Co.

judges: Before Jones, C. J., Eagen, O’Brien, Roberts, Pomeroy, Nix and Manderino, JJ.
parties: Hodge, Appellant, v. Jamie Record Co.

opinions.text:
Opinion
Per Curiam,
Decree affirmed. Appellant to bear costs.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

Steve Angstreich, with him Barry E. Ungar, and Mann and Ungar, for appellees.
casebody.head_matter:
Hodge, Appellant, v. Jamie Record Co.
Argued January 8, 1973.
Before Jones, C. J., Eagen, O’Brien, Roberts, Pomeroy, Nix and Manderino, JJ.
8. Jay STclar, with him James E. Biely, and Speese é Kephatd, for appellant.
Steve Angstreich, with him Barry E. Ungar, and Mann and Ungar, for appellees.
March 16, 1973:
